intro: Mimosa eriophylla, commonly known as the silver mimosa, is a low-growing shrub native to Australia. It is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage, which is covered in fine,绒毛-like hairs. The plant produces small, fluffy white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in late winter to early spring. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in coastal and sandy habitats.
